trans-unit.target: 每当你以一个或数个仙灵攻击时，抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。当你以此法弃一张牌时，在目标由你操控的仙灵上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: WOE·73 | Talion's Messenger | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Kindly Lord does not issue invitations to their court lightly. I suggest you accept."
trans-unit.target: 「仁慈仙王从不轻易请人入廷。在此建议你乖乖从命。」

You may cast the exiled card this turn. trans-unit.resname: WOE·256 | Evolving Wilds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The wilds are unpredictable. Rivers change course, trees shuffle and bend, rocks split and scurry. But mark my words, traveler—the main thing that'll change out there is *you*."\n—Sturwynn, Boundary Lands ranger
trans-unit.target: 「诚然，幻野地势变幻多变：河流忽而改道，树木抽枝弯折，岩石开裂破碎。但旅人啊，请谨记我的话～在外会变的，主要是你自己。」 ～边境地巡林客斯图温

trans-unit.target: 欢笑女爵

trans-unit.resname: WOE·370 | Lady of Laughter | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying Celebration — At the beginning of your end step, if two or more nonland permanents entered the battlefield under your control this turn, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 欢庆～在你的结束步骤开始时，若本回合中有两个或更多非地永久物在你的操控下进战场，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: WOE·371 | Faerie Slumber Party | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Faerie Slumber Party
trans-unit.target: 仙灵迷宴

trans-unit.resname: WOE·371 | Faerie Slumber Party | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Return all creatures to their owners' hands. For each opponent who controlled a creature returned this way, you create two 1/1 blue Faerie creature tokens with flying and "This creature can block only creatures with flying."
trans-unit.target: 将所有生物移回其拥有者手上。每有一位所操控之生物被此法移回的对手，你便派出两个1/1蓝色仙灵衍生生物，且具有飞行与「此生物只能阻挡具飞行异能的生物。」

trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: WOE·372 | Malevolent Witchkite | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Malevolent Witchkite enters the battlefield, sacrifice any number of artifacts, enchantments, and/or tokens, then draw that many cards.
trans-unit.target: 当恶毒残虐巫进战场时，牺牲任意数量的神器，结界和／或衍生物，然后抓等量的牌。

trans-unit.source: Menace
trans-unit.target: 威慑

trans-unit.resname: WOE·373 | Ogre Chitterlord | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Ogre Chitterlord enters the battlefield or attacks, create two 1/1 black Rat creature tokens with "This creature can't block." Then if you control five or more Rats, each Rat you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当食人魔鼠王进战场或攻击时，派出两个1/1黑色老鼠衍生生物，且具有「此生物不能进行阻挡。」然后若你操控五个或更多老鼠，则每个由你操控的老鼠各得+2/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.target: 野林导师

trans-unit.resname: WOE·374 | Wildwood Mentor | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a token enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Wildwood Mentor.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个衍生物在你的操控下进战场时，在野林导师上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: WOE·374 | Wildwood Mentor | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Wildwood Mentor attacks, another target attacking creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is Wildwood Mentor's power.
trans-unit.target: 每当野林导师攻击时，另一个目标进行攻击的生物得+X/+X直到回合结束，X为野林导师的力量。

{2}{B}，从你的坟墓场放逐窃梦仙灵：你抓一张牌且失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: WOE·378 | Torch the Tower | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Torch the Tower deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If this spell was bargained, instead it deals 3 damage to that permanent and you scry 1.
trans-unit.target: 点燃塔楼对目标生物或鹏洛客造成2点伤害。如果此咒语已加码，则改为它对该永久物造成3点伤害且你占卜1。

trans-unit.resname: WOE·378 | Torch the Tower | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: If a permanent dealt damage by Torch the Tower would die this turn, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 本回合中，如果受过点燃塔楼伤害的永久物将死去，则改为将它放逐。
